name: covid19japan-nhk
description: Tools for automating extraction of data from NHK articles

scripts.deploy-summary: gcloud functions deploy nhkSummary --project covid19-analysis --runtime nodejs12 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.deploy-articles: gcloud functions deploy nhkArticles --project covid19-analysis --runtime nodejs12 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.logs-summary: gcloud functions logs read nhkSummary --project covid19-analysis
scripts.logs-articles: gcloud functions logs read nhkArticles --project covid19-analysis

author: Alastair Tse <alastair@liquidx.net>
